tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE cryptocurrency_prices (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    coin_name VARCHAR(100),
    price FLOAT,
    volume FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE cryptocurrency_prices (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    coin_name VARCHAR(50),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    volume INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE trend_analysis (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    coin_name VARCHAR(50),
    trend_type VARCHAR(50),
    trend_description TEXT,
    analysis_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE CryptocurrencyPrices (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    symbol VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    volume DECIMAL(12, 2) NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE CryptocurrencyTrends (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    coin_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    trend_type VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    trend_description TEXT,
    trend_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE cryptocurrency_prices (
   id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   timestamp TIMESTAMP,
   cryptocurrency_name VARCHAR(50),
   price DECIMAL
)
